body:
It parametrizes w as w=g * v/||v|| without posing any constraint on either g, v, or w. 

If you want to ensure that w has magnitude 1, I suggest doing one of the two approaches:
1. reparameterize as w = g / ||g||
2. do a manual projection after every optimization step.
